footer.title: DOF-RAG
footer.description: Research project for processing and analyzing information from the Official Journal of the Federation.

home.stay_updated: Stay updated with the project news
home.subtitle: Tracking and documenting progress in the development of retrieval and augmented generation systems for the Official Journal of the Federation.
about.title: About the project
about.project_description: DOF-RAG is a research and development project that combines Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) technologies to facilitate access to and understanding of the information contained in Mexico's Official Journal of the Federation.
about.project_objective: Our goal is to create a tool that allows users of different backgrounds to quickly and efficiently access legislative and regulatory information published in the DOF, presenting it in a clear and contextualized manner.
about.team_description: We are a multidisciplinary team of researchers, developers, and experts in computer science and artificial intelligence, committed to improving access to public information through the use of advanced technologies.
about.methodology_description: Our approach is based on the RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) architecture, which combines the power of language models with specific knowledge bases:
about.data_extraction_description: We systematically collect and process information published in the DOF, transforming it into structured formats for analysis.
about.vector_indexing_description: We convert documents into vector representations that capture their semantic meaning, enabling precise and contextual searches.
about.augmented_generation_description: We use advanced language models that, supported by the retrieved information, generate precise and coherent answers.
about.contact_description: If you're interested in our project or have any questions, feel free to contact us:
